results.title: Learn Ansible From Ground Up: The Devops Guide

Learn to manage and configure your infrastructure optimally

results.title: Kubernetes Course from a DevOps guru (Kubernetes + Docker)
results.headline: Kubernetes from the ground up, deploy and scale performant, and reliable containerized applications with Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Deploy production-grade applications on Kubernetes
Deploy Highly Available Kubernetes clusters on AWS
Be able to administer, understand, and deploy Kubernetes

results.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 2018
results.headline: Let's get started with AWS
objectives_summary: You will have high level overview on what AWS Cloud is all about.
You will be ready to give the AWS Cloud Practitioner certification exam.

You will become a superman/superwoman at creating beautiful dashboards!
You will be able to create dynamic dashboards using templates and variables

results.headline: Learn to master Java 8 and Java 10 core development step-by-step and make your first unique, advanced program in 30 days

results.title: Learn DevOps: Infrastructure Automation With Terraform
results.headline: Learn how to automate your infrastructure with terraform. Covers Terraform with AWS, Packer, Docker, ECS, EKS, Jenkins
objectives_summary: Understand, use and apply terraform
Know when to use different features
Use terraform with AWS

results.title: Master Jenkins CI For DevOps and Developers

visible_instructors.title: CJ Rivas
visible_instructors.name: CJ
visible_instructors.job_title: Cloud Solutions Architect and DevOps Engineer

results.headline: Learn how to build automated continuous integration pipeline with Jenkins. Take your DevOps skills to the next level.
objectives_summary: Understand the concepts of continuous inspection, continuous integration, and continuous deployment, and the difference between them.
Implent an automated continuous integration pipeline to build, test, analyze and deploy a web-based application with Jenkins.
Create a multi-stage Jenkins job and visualize the complicated build pipeline with Jenkins build pipeline plugin.

results.title: Mastering Ansible
results.headline: A complete guide to configuration management and orchestration with Ansible.
objectives_summary: Execute ad-hoc commands against servers using Ansible
Write Ansible configuration playbooks to deploy a 3-tier web application
Configure Ansible roles with tasks, handlers, files, templates, and default variables

objectives_summary: Understand How Computer Networks Work
Know the Inner Workings of a Computer Network
Understand the Benefits of Computer Networks

results.title: Ansible Essentials: Simplicity in Automation
results.headline: Learn the basics of Ansible automation and configuration management, and more
objectives_summary: Understand Ansible and its key components at a high-level and what differentiates it from other tools. Students will also be prepared for more advanced Ansible training courses.

results.title: AWS Concepts
results.headline: This course is to provide a simple, conceptual introduction to the concepts of Cloud Computing and Amazon Web Services.
objectives_summary: Have the conceptual foundation to move forward onto more advanced AWS courses
Be more prepared to tackle the more complex technical concepts and terminology

results.title: AWS Essentials
results.headline: Get started using AWS's core services.
objectives_summary: Understand and use core services of Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Understand and use Identity & Access Management (IAM)
Understand and use Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

results.headline: Learn Python like a Professional! Start from the basics and go all the way to creating your own applications and games!
